code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[groups,setGroups]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{setLoading(true);fetch('api/groups').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setGroups(data);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,className:"App-logo",alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App-intro",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"JUG List"}),groups.map(group=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:group.name},group.id))]})]})});};export default App;
